title: How Homesteading Helped Lyme Disease Recovery
itunes:title: How Homesteading Helped Lyme Disease Recovery
description: When Autumn was bit by a tick at age 19, it took a number of years before her Lyme disease surfaced. She realized a change needed to happen, little did she know homesteading would help her Lyme Disease recovery. melissaknorris.com/280
